description:
It`s a summer festival! The Ham-Hams learn from Maxwell that on the night of the festival, flowers (fireworks) will appear in the sky. Pashmina separates from the Ham-Hams to find the flowers and climbs to the roof of the Temple of the Sun, getting lost in the process. The Ham-Hams save her and watch the fireworks. Meanwhile, while Laura and Kana are walking around the festival, Kana gets separated from Laura. Laura sees Travis, and goes to find Kana. Laura finally finds Kana, and they also watch the fireworks. 
Source: Wikipedia

titles.title: とっとこ冒険! 夏祭り
